item.maplecraft.use_elixir_description: 恢复 50% 最大 HP 和 MP
item.maplecraft.use_power_elixir_descrip: 恢复 100% 最大 HP 和 MP
item.maplecraft.etc_meso_small_descripti: 金币，可以兑换9个小金币
item.maplecraft.etc_meso_medium_descript: 许多金币，可以兑换9个金币
item.maplecraft.etc_meso_large_descripti: 大量金币，可以兑换9个大金币
item.maplecraft.etc_maple_leaf_descripti: 非常稀有，可以用于制造枫叶装备
item.maplecraft.etc_eye_of_fire_descript: 扎昆之树的种子, 可以用在扎昆祭坛上召唤扎昆
item.maplecraft.necklace_pendant_of_the_: 佩戴时可以增加获取的经验
item.maplecraft.skill_power_strike_descr: 对一个怪物造成大量伤害
item.maplecraft.skill_rage_description: 增加10%攻击力，同时降低10%防御力
item.maplecraft.skill_shout_description: 对怪物造成眩晕和伤害
item.maplecraft.skill_combo_attack_descr: 攻击怪物叠加斗气，斗气等级可以增加终结技能的伤害
item.maplecraft.skill_panic_description: 使用黑暗力量和斗气攻击怪物
item.maplecraft.skill_dragon_fury_descri: 挥动枪攻击前方多个怪物
item.maplecraft.skill_spear_crusher_desc: 对一个怪物造成多次伤害
item.maplecraft.skill_dragon_roar_descri: 消耗HP和MP召唤巨龙攻击怪物
item.maplecraft.skill_magic_claw_descrip: 消耗MP对同一个怪物连续攻击两次
item.maplecraft.skill_poison_brace_descr: 释放一个毒球，使怪物受伤并中毒
item.maplecraft.skill_explosion_descript: Creating an explosion around the player
item.maplecraft.skill_element_compositio: Attacks a single monster by splashing a Poison drop
item.maplecraft.skill_cold_beam_descript: Creates a sharp piece of ice to fire at an enemy, freeze monster for 2 seconds
item.maplecraft.skill_thunderbolt_descri: Creates an electric force field and attack every monsters
item.maplecraft.skill_ice_strike_descrip: Fires ice blocks at multiple enemies, can freeze monsters
item.maplecraft.skill_element_compositio: Attacks a single monster with Magic attack of Ice and Lightning
item.maplecraft.skill_heal_description: Recovers the HP and undead monsters will receive damage
item.maplecraft.skill_holy_arrow_descrip: Fires holy arrows at an enemy
item.maplecraft.skill_shining_ray_descri: Attacks multiple enemies at once with the ray of holy light. Applies massive damage to the undead monsters
item.maplecraft.skill_holy_dragon_descri: Summons a holy dragon to follow the player and attack the monsters
item.maplecraft.skill_double_shot_descri: Fires two arrows at once to attack an enemy
item.maplecraft.skill_arrow_bomb_descrip: Fires a arrow with bomb attached to it
item.maplecraft.skill_iron_arrow_descrip: Fires a arrow which penetrates through enemies
item.maplecraft.skill_arrow_rain_descrip: Fires a number of arrows into the sky, attacking multi-monsters at once on its way down
item.maplecraft.skill_arrow_eruption_des: Fires a number of arrows into the ground, attacking multi-monsters at once on its way down
item.maplecraft.skill_lucky_seven_descri: Use MP to throw 2 throwing stars
item.maplecraft.skill_double_stab_descri: Use MP to quickly stab an enemy twice
item.maplecraft.skill_drain_description: Absorb some of the damage dished out to the enemy as HP
item.maplecraft.skill_savage_blow_descri: Use MP to attack an enemy 6 times in a row with a dagger
item.maplecraft.skill_shadow_partner_des: A shadow will appear, repeating your every move
item.maplecraft.skill_avenger_descriptio: Uses MP to make an enormous throwing star for attack. The throwing star will go through enemies
item.maplecraft.skill_assaulter_descript: Attacks one enemy with incredible power and speed. Enemy can even be stunned on a low success rate
item.maplecraft.skill_meso_explosion_des: Explodes the mesos dropped on the ground around you to attack monsters
utils.maplecraft.cube_no_potential: 装备还未有潜能，请先使用潜能卷轴
utils.maplecraft.cube_quality_mismatch: 魔方仅能作用于装备等级不大于
utils.maplecraft.scroll_quality_mismatch: 该卷轴仅能作用于装备等级不大于
utils.maplecraft.scroll_item_can_not_get: 该物品无法获得潜在属性
item.maplecraft.etc_basic_monster_crysta: Can be used to repair equip
item.maplecraft.etc_basic_equip_crystal_: Can be used to craft equip
item.maplecraft.etc_intermediate_monster: Can be used to repair equip
item.maplecraft.etc_intermediate_equip_c: Can be used to craft equip
item.maplecraft.etc_advanced_monster_cry: Can be used to repair equip
item.maplecraft.etc_advanced_equip_cryst: Can be used to craft equip
quest.maplecraft.10001_description: The red potion can be crafted by an apple and two glass bottles, it can recover 2 HP immediately.
quest.maplecraft.10002_description: The orange potion can be crafted by a carrot and two glass bottles, it can recover 2 MP immediately.
quest.maplecraft.10003_description: You can make a Maple weapon or armor gain potential by applying potential scrolls to it. The rare potential scroll can be dropped from mobs or made with book and tiny mesos. You can complete this quest by holding a Maple weapon with potential.
quest.maplecraft.10004_description: Cubes can be used to reset equip potentials or upgrade potential rarity, Occult Cube can be made with redstone and tiny mesos.
quest.maplecraft.10005_description: This is your first job advancement, you can select your job from warrior, magician, archer and rogue. Please collect 10 gunpowder and reach level 5 to prove your ability.
quest.maplecraft.10006_description: This is the 2nd job advancement, you have grown a lot since last time, don't you want to get even more powerful than that? Pass a simple test by collecting 10 blaze rods and reach level 10.
quest.maplecraft.10007_description: This is your 3rd job advancement, you will become stronger by proving your brave and strength, reach level 20 and bring the required items.
quest.maplecraft.10008_description: The boss Zakum is hiding somewhere in the Nether, you need the Eye of Fire to summon it at the Zakum's Altar. The Lost Golden Tooth can be find from Zombified Piglin.
quest.maplecraft.10009_description: Zakum's Altar can be found in Nether, use Eye of Fire to summon the boss Zakum and defeat it. The quest can be completed by equipping the Zakum's Helmet.
quest.maplecraft.10010_description: Maple Leaf is a rare item and can be used to craft maple weapons. There is a low chance to find them from diamond ore.
